name: BetaBlockerTherapyForLVSD
title: Beta Blocker Therapy for LVSD
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of medications for beta blocker therapy for left ventricular systolic dysfunction (LVSD).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Medication.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a medication for generic and prescribable bisoprolol, carvedilol, or sustained release metoprolol succinate.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent non-prescribable branded drugs, components or ingredients.)
